title: Robin: Year One 01-04 (2000-2001|Digital|Minutemen-InnerDemons)
description:
This is awesome "refresher" of Dick Grayson's origins is written by longtime Batman/Robin writer Chuck Dixon, with art from Scott Beatty and an assist from Javier Pulido. Promotional information for the collected edition - "The classic tale of young Dick Grayson's baptism by fire as he dons the costume of Robin for the first time! Becoming a hero is anything but easy!After a young Dick Grayson's parents were murdered, millionaire playboy Bruce Wayne took the youth in as his ward and changed his life forever. Using his days in the circus as a trapeze artist as a basis for his education, Batman spent months training Dick in the ways of combat and crime fighting. This book presents Dick's baptism by fire as he dons the costume of Robin, the Boy Wonder for the first time and patrols the night by Batman's side. In his earliest adventures, Robin learns very quickly that what he thought would be fun is actually a matter of life and death."

Thanks to Minutemen-InnerDemons for these awesome digital copies. There are also digital versions by Golgoth-Empire available but these are higher resolution. Please seed, and enjoy! :-)
